main event: A MATS aircraft flying at position 18째30'N 164째25'E on February 17, 1962 at 14:15 UTC reported sighting what appeared to be a rocket reentry.
interesting points: The object was greenish in color with a white sputtering tail.
The object was visible from 45 degrees through 20 degrees above the horizon.
The direction of travel of the object was not reported.
The sighting was made on a bearing of 113 degrees from the aircraft's position.
The report was classified as a CIRVIS (Communications Instructions for Reporting Vital Intelligence Sightings) report.
sighted object: greenish object with white sputtering tail
